subSection.type: ?type specimens deposited at the zoological museum hamburg (zmh)

subSubSection.paragraph: " Hesperia sidae Esp. var. onopordi H.-S. ab. nova alboradiata Bub." Bubacek, 1926 Verh. Zool. Bot. Ges. Wien 76: 174.

Labelled as
" Type "
1? (ZMH 833497) (Fig. 171 ). " Type / H. sidae v. onopordi / ab. alboradiata Bub. / Z. B. G. 1926 O. Bubacek " // " Italia / Alassio - Liguria / 7/6 1925 / Coll. O. Bubacek " // [blank label] // "ZMH 833497
".

Bubacek (1926) proposed this name as an aberration of
H. sidae
v. onopordi "H.-S." (sic, recte Rambur, 1839), therefore, as stated by articles 45.6.1 and 45.6.2 ( ICZN 1999 ) it is deemed to be an infrasubspecific name (the author used "aberration" , "ab." , or the author expressly gave it infrasubspecific rank) and is hence unavailable.
P. onopordi
Rambur is a distinct species from
P. sidae
Esper, and both species occur sympatrically in Liguria.
